<font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2">1.
<a href="./dns.php?action=editDomain&did=1043529">somewhere.com</a>&nbsp;[<a href="http://somewhere.com" target="new">Go</a>]</font>&nbsp;[<a href="./dns.php?action=delDomain&did=1043529"><B>X</B></a>]<BR><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2">2.

<font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><B>Secondary Domains:</b></font><BR><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2">3.
secondarydomain.com <b>(</b>primarydomain.com<b>)</b> [<a href="http://secondarydomain.com" target="new">Go</a>]</font>&nbsp;[<a href="./dns.php?action=delDomain&did=1044140&t=sec"><B>X</B></a>]<BR><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2">4.
secondarydomain2.com <b>(</b>primarydomain.com<b>)</b> [<a href="http://secondarydomain2.com" target="new">Go</a>]</font>&nbsp;[<a href="./dns.php?action=delDomain&did=1044165&t=sec"><B>X</B></a>]<BR><hr align="center" width="80%">
<font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><B>Dynamic Domains:</b></font><BR><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2">5.
<a href='dns.php?action=editDynamic&dynid=114471'>dynamicdomain.com</a>&nbsp;[<a href="http://dynamicdomain.com" target="new">Go</a>]</font>&nbsp;[<a href="./dns.php?action=delDomain&dynid=114471&t=dyn"><B>X</B></a>]<BR><BR>
<font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="1">
You must use a <a href="./dynamic.php">client</a> to update the IP for these domains.
All <b>dynamic domains</b> will point to the same dynamic IP whenever updated.
Currently, all domains are pointed at 67.170.56.108.
</font>
<hr align="center" width="80%">
<font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><B>Webhop Domains:</b></font><BR><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="1">6.
webhopdomain.com -> <input type"text" value="http://geocities.com/~username/page.html" style="font-size:10" disabled>&nbsp;[<a href="http://webhopdomain.com" target="new">Go</a>]</font>&nbsp;[<a href="./dns.php?action=delDomain&did=1044142"><B>X</B></a>]<BR><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="1">7.
webhopdomain2.com -> <input type"text" value="http://geocities.com/~username/page.html" style="font-size:10" disabled>&nbsp;[<a href="http://webhopdomain2.com" target="new">Go</a>]</font>&nbsp;[<a href="./dns.php?action=delDomain&did=1044216"><B>X</B></a>]<BR>                </td>

                <td>
<font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif"><b><font size="2"> Add new domain:</font></b></font>
                  <form name="addDomain" method="get" action="./dns.php">
<font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2">
<b>(basic)</b><br>

                    <input type="hidden" name="action" value="addDomain">
                    <input type="text" name="newdomain" value="eg: everydns.net"><div align="right"><input type="submit" value=">> (basic)"></div>
<b>(advanced options)</b>
                    <div align="left"><input type="radio" name="sec" value="sec"> Make domain secondary using <input type="text" name="ns"> as master&nbsp;nameserver.</div>
<B>OR</B><BR>
<input type="radio" name="sec" value="dyn"> Make domain <a href="dynamic.php">dynamic</a>.
<BR><B>OR</B><BR>
<input type="radio" name="sec" value="webhop"> Make domain a webhop to <input type="text" name="hop" value="eg: http://geocities.com/~username/page.html">
<div align="right"><input type="submit" value=">> (advanced)"></div>
</font>
                  </form>
                </td>
              </tr>
